definition: Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: The Scythian Pazyryk of the Altai Mountain region were another ancient culture which employed tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔泰山脉的斯基台人也是有纹身的古文明。

definition: Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces
Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4
Gu3 er3 ban1 tong1 gu3 te4 Sha1 mo4

definition: Carpathian Mountains, 1500-km mountain range in Central and Eastern Europe
pinyin: Ka1 er3 ba1 qian1 Shan1 mai4
